360 Yes Scope.effect: Spinning 360 degrees provides a 3-second buff that gives the next shot a 1.5x damage multiplier. The buff stacks if the player spins multiple times.

Absent Minded.effect: The Membrane's shots bounce 4 times and become homing.

Added Effect - Fire.effect: The first shot of each magazine is guaranteed to be a fire bullet.

Added Effect - Ice.effect: The first shot of each magazine is guaranteed to be an ice bullet.

Added Effect - Poison.effect: The first shot of each magazine is guaranteed to be a poison bullet.

AI Assistant.effect: Roll bombs will bounce around instead of detonating immediately, and can be manually detonated with iBomb Companion App.

Air Support.effect: Air Strike covers a massive area.

AK-47 (Island Forme).effect: Pressing reload with a full magazine toggles Island Forme. Island Forme AK-47 fires oranges, which deal more damage than regular AK-47 shots. Each orange does 7 damage per shot, as opposed to the usual 5.5.

Akey Breaky.effect: AKEY-47 receives a damage boost (10 damage per bullet), infinite ammo, and changes in appearance to resemble a Shelleton and can no longer open locks by shooting at them.

Alas, Sniperion.effect: Crown of Guns transforms into a tiara that fires higher-damage crescent-shaped bullets.

Alistair's Ladder.effect: Thunderclap shoots 2 bullets instead of one.

All Out Of Law.effect: Colt 1851 fires three tight spreads of three free bullets upon reloading. These projectiles ignore tables when fired from behind them.

Alternative Rock.effect: Face Melter fires two parallel columns of notes, shoots a guitar pick with a chance to stun upon reloading, and changes appearance to that of a Dean Z Blue Burst guitar.

Ancient Aliens.effect: Gives Zorgun 3 Final Shots, and gives Alien Engine occasional Zorgun bullets.

Anti-Aircraft.effect: RPG spawns 7 homing flak bullets upon impact.

Antichamber.effect: Dark Marker alternates between firing red and blue shots that become very slow and large after traveling a short distance. If any red and blue shots touch, the blank effect is activated.

Apiary.effect: Bee Hive turns into an apiary and automatically regenerates ammo over time.

Arctic Warfare.effect: A.W.P.'s color changes to orange and white, its shots freeze enemies, and it deals 62.5% more damage.

Armored Corps.effect: Both guns gain increased shot speed and deal 25% more damage.

Backdraft.effect: Touching enemies sets them on fire.

Bacon and Eggs.effect: Increases the speed of The Scrambler's eggs by 50%.

Banshee Cry.effect: Screecher fires a cone of three waves per shot.

Barrage Shot.effect: Decreases the charge time of Charge Shot by 25%, increases reload time by 50%, and increases shot size.

Battery Powered.effect: Shock Rifle slowly regenerates ammo over time.

Battle Mode.effect: Bombs periodically spawn and orbit the player, exploding and dealing 40 damage upon touching an enemy.

Bee Plus.effect: Taking damage causes Honeycomb to spawn hornets, which travel faster and deal more damage than regular bees.

BEES.effect: Doubles the size of Bee Hive's bees and increases their damage by 25%, but decreases Bee Hive's rate of fire by 34%.

Behold!.effect: Increases damage by 30%, magazine size by 50%, spread by 50%, decreases reload time by 33%, and slows down enemy bullets by 20% when one of the guns is held. When Eye of the Beholster is held, the other five guns rotate around the player and shoot at nearby enemies, still using up ammo from each gun. Obtainable through the Beholster Shrine, although it can be activated without.

Beta Ray.effect: Gamma Ray's beam grows larger and deals more damage.

Betrayer's Lies.effect: Betrayer's Shield gains infinite ammo, a much larger magazine size, and extremely high fire rate. Like other guns with infinite ammo, it cannot reveal secret rooms.

Big Shotgun Gun.effect: Big Shotgun fires 4 projectiles instead of 3. The player also has an extended roll while holding the Big Shotgun.

Birthright.effect: While Shellegun is held, Baby Good Shelleton alternates between its laser and a wide-angle shot similar to the Shelleton enemy.

Black Flag.effect: Corsair gains a black flag, and every Corsair shot will periodically fire two bouncing cannonballs perpendicular to itself as it travels.

Blade Runner.effect: Increases the magazine size of both weapons by 50%.

blade.effect: Kruller Glaive's damage is increased by 20%, enemies hit will visually bleed, and jammed enemies will revert to normal on hit.

Blank Generation.effect: Companion changes appearance to be older, automatically fires a second blank after Elder Blank's blank duration ends.

Blast Crown.effect: Crown of Guns has a chance to fire explosives.

Blessing and a Curse.effect: Every jammed enemy killed grants a persistent, additive 0.0025 (0.25%) damage buff.

Block Party.effect: Increases the size of Brick Breaker's shells by 50%, and increases their damage by 25%.

Bluer Guon Stone.effect: Blue Guon Stone's size and rotation speed is increased. If Blue Guon Stone blocks a bullet, it deals 15 damage to all nearby enemies.

Blunderbrace.effect: Blunderbuss gains 50% increased shot speed and 25% larger bullets along with a shorter charge time.

Bomberpal.effect: Lil' Bomber fires two bombs instead of one, charges twice as fast, and has 40% lower reload time.

Brave New World.effect: While Siren is held, spawns a fish companion which shows what items are inside chests without opening them.

Breakfast Club.effect: Halves the reload time of Wind Up Gun, increases fire rate by 60%, and increases damage by 50%. Increases magazine size to 27, and all but the last 10 shots of each magazine will be stronger piercing lasers.

Bubble Trouble.effect: Siren now shoots a single, large bullet, and Bubble Blaster gains homing shots.

Buckle Up.effect: Gungine has a chance to not consume ammo upon firing. Continuously moving with Gungine held gives the player a yellow glow, significantly increasing Gungine's rate of fire. The glow disappears if the player stops moving. If the player switches to another gun while outlined, they can keep the rate of fire bonus.

Buggin' Out.effect: While Gungeon Ant is held, Bug Boots spread oil instead of poison, and the player is immune to fire.

Bullet Kiln.effect: Using Elder Blank while having The Kiln or Luxin Cannon selected gives one Glass Guon Stone to the player, up to a maximum of four. This limit can be worked around by dropping excess glass guon stones on the floor before using the Elder Blank, and then collecting them again.

Bullet or the Egg.effect: Scrambler shots become larger and split into 10 seekers instead of 5.

Buster Gun.effect: Excaliber fires 3 or 4 projectiles in a cone when reloaded.

Cactus Flower.effect: Cactus has a chance to shoot out a prickly pear that bounces off walls and shoots needles all around.

Camera Shy.effect: Camera has a chance to stun enemies.

Captain Plant It.effect: Portable Turret gains Unity's damage bonus.

Careful Iteration.effect: Casey becomes spiked and fires a spread of 6 nails each time it is swung.

Cash Rules Everygun Around Me.effect: When firing any gun, occasionally fires money which charms enemies.

Cast Iron.effect: Gives Big Iron transmogrification effects and replaces each bullet with one from Bundle of Wands, Witch Pistol, and Hexagun.

Cat Friend.effect: Bait Launcher's tigers attach several Cat Claw needles onto enemies when they maul them.

Cerebral Bros.effect: Bullet Bore fires 2 drills per shot instead of the usual 1.

Chain Lightning.effect: Increases the range that Shock Rounds connects bullets with electricity. Lightning can also connect to enemy bullets.

Chance On Hit.effect: Gunderfury shots have a chance to slow enemies.

Chest High is the Best High.effect: Increases damage by 25% and activates the Macho Brace effect after flipping a table. This version of the Macho Brace effect is different to the actual item's, as it increases damage by 100% for a brief time rather than Macho Brace's 30%.

Chicken Arise.effect: Increases the chance for the guns to transmogrify enemies.

Chief Master.effect: Alien Sidearm has a much larger magazine and cannot be charged, but becomes fully automatic and the final two shots in the magazine are fully-charged shots.

Clawntlet.effect: The player releases a spiral of bullets whenever they take damage.

Clearer Guon Stone.effect: Grants immunity to poison, fire, and electricity. Shooting enemies while standing on fire or ice will burn or freeze them, respectively.

Cold 1896.effect: The guns are dual-wielded. Both guns' magazine sizes are doubled.

Cold Ones.effect: Significantly increases the chance of firing ice bullets.

Comammo Belt.effect: Com4nd0 gains double magazine size and changes appearance.

Contractual Obligation.effect: A pool of oil spawns underneath enemies killed with Gungine.

Contrail.effect: Alien Engine's sprite changes and the flame turns green, igniting enemies with green fire. Alien Engine also grants flight while held.

Cool Kids Club.effect: Continuously moving with Strafe Gun held gives the player a yellow glow, increasing movement speed. The glow disappears if the player stops moving.

Cormorant.effect: Transforms the player into Cormorant. Removes reload times from all guns entirely. Increases curse by 3.

Cosmic Horror.effect: Black holes fire three tentacles while active.

Crave the Glaive.effect: Kruller Glaive will try to hit every enemy in the room before returning, similar to the Boomerang.

Crestfallen Soul.effect: Increases dodge roll speed by 20%. Crestfaller deals 50% more damage if the player dies and has not yet retrieved their soul.

Criticaliber.effect: After taking damage with Vorpal Gun held, the next Vorpal Gun shot is guaranteed to be a critical shot.

Cryptic Cryptids.effect: Phoenix shoots out rows of fire on the ground. Both guns pierce enemies and deal additional damage. The player is immune to fire while the guns are held.

Crystal Horn.effect: Luxin Cannon gets three crystal shots at the end of each magazine, and each crystal shot bursts into many more crystals. Additionally, when an enemy is killed with Unicorn Horn, they explode into Luxin Cannon projectiles.

Dawn of the Gundead.effect: Doubles the chance for Zombie Bullets to refund missed shots for the guns.

Dead Cell.effect: Decreases Railgun's charge time and increases its damage to bosses by 30%.

Dead Prez.effect: Derringer fires bouncing Dueling Pistol shots. Dueling Pistol fires a wide spread of 4 bullets alongside its normal shots.

Deadlier Distraction.effect: Decoy explodes and creates a large poison pool when attacked.

Deadly Distraction.effect: Decoy creates a large poison pool when attacked.

Death Square.effect: Damaging enemies with Dueling Pistol rapidly recharges Dueling Laser.

Decoy Octorok.effect: The decoy will turn into a charmed enemy.

Detective Mode.effect: Increases 38 Special's maximum ammo to 600, halves reload time, and increases damage by 20%. The police officer will also reveal the contents of nearby chests.

Devil's Plaything.effect: Bullet Idol orbits the player, blocking enemy shots.

Diamond Weapon.effect: The last shot of each magazine is guaranteed to be an ice bullet.

Diazepam.effect: Increases the damage of the guns by 50%.

Don't Hoot the Messenger.effect: Dungeon Eagle's charged shots gain significant knockback.

Don't Worry About The Vase.effect: Destroying small breakable objects (vases, barrels, etc.) has a small chance to activate a blank effect.

Double Double Helix.effect: Helix Gun Fires 4 projectiles per shot instead of 2, damage is increased by 25%, and shot speed is increased by 50%.

Double Down.effect: Removes the cooldown from Gunboots; every roll will fire bullets.

Double Rainbow.effect: While Stuffed Star is active, five Unicorn Horn beams are fired from the player in all directions.

Dragunice.effect: Dragunfire shoots a blue fireball that has a chance to burn and/or freeze enemies.

Dualing Pistol.effect: Dueling Pistol changes appearance and its shots seek enemies.

Dumb Smart Bullets.effect: Bullets unaffected by Homing Bullets become larger and deal 50% more damage.

Dwarven Stout.effect: Double Vision triples shots instead of doubling them.

EGG MURDERER.effect: Light Gun's ducks periodically send out two Scrambler shots perpendicular to itself as it travels.

Elder Blank Bullets.effect: Blank Bullets's blank effect reflects bullets instead of deleting them.

Electron Pack.effect: Kills with Proton Backpack spawn allied ghosts that attack enemies.

Emerald Weapon.effect: The last shot of each magazine is guaranteed to be a poison bullet.

Emergency Help.effect: Reduces the reload time of Flare Gun by 66% and increases its damage by 50%. While Flare Gun is held, random enemies will periodically have explosions erupt around them, damaging them and hurting other enemies around them.

Empty Vessels.effect: If damage is taken while Bottle is empty, it fills with a purple flame that deals 100 damage to all enemies in the room upon use.

Enter the Fruitgeon.effect: Orange Guon Stone fires oranges at enemies, dealing 7 damage.

Extreme Operation.effect: Using Melted Rock causes corpses to shoot at enemies.

Fairy Bow.effect: Halves the charge time of Bow and adds a chance of firing an extra arrow, similar to the effect of Shadow Bullets.

Fear the Old Blood.effect: Decreases the reload time of Trick Gun by 33% and increases fire rate by 20%.

Fightknives.effect: Activating Knife Shield while holding Fightsabre makes the spawned knives reflect bullets before getting destroyed. Knives spawned this way are tinted green.

Fightsabre Training.effect: While Fightsabre is held, an orbital appears that blocks enemy shots.

Finger on the Pulse.effect: Upon taking damage, spawns 3 Pulse Cannons that attack enemies.

Firing With Flair.effect: Flare Gun sets green fire, which leaves enemies permanently burning.

Five O'Clock Somewhere.effect: Reloading will fire a glass bottle that will stun enemies it hits. Reloading while standing on a liquid replenishes the ammo missing in the current magazine, similar to Gungine.

Flat Stanley.effect: Reduces the magazine size of Mailbox by 50% and reduces its reload time by 33%.

Friend to Gun and Bullet.effect: While Potion of Gun Friendship is active, a copy of the player's current gun appears and automatically fires at nearby enemies.

Frostier Distraction.effect: Decoy freezes enemies that attack it and explodes after a short period.

Frosty Distraction.effect: Decoy freezes enemies that attack it.

Frosty the Bullet Tyrant.effect: Snowballer shots increase in size and damage the further they travel.

Full Circle.effect: Tangler becomes round, turns enemies round instead of rectangular, and gains increased damage and reload time.

Future Gangster.effect: Thompson Sub-Machinegun fires lasers. Each laser does 6.5 damage instead of the normal 5 damage.

Garbage Collecting.effect: Hitting an enemy with Trashcannon causes it and its bullets to briefly freeze.

Get Equipped With -A-.effect: Enables Air Shooter mode which fires Balloon Gun tornadoes when uncharged. Modes can be switched by reloading Megahand with a full magazine.

Get Equipped With -B-.effect: Enables Bubble Lead mode which fires Bubble Blaster bubbles when uncharged. Modes can be switched by reloading Megahand with a full magazine.

Get Equipped With -C-.effect: Enables Crash Bomber mode, which fires a Bullet Bore bullet at full charge. Modes can be switched by reloading Megahand with a full magazine.

Get Equipped with -F-.effect: Enables Time Stopper mode, which fires a flash that stops time for a second and deals damage to all enemies on screen when fully charged. Modes can be switched by reloading Megahand with a full magazine.

Get Equipped With -H-.effect: Enables Atomic Fire mode which fires piercing fireballs when uncharged that set everything in their path on fire. Modes can be switched by reloading Megahand with a full magazine.

Get Equipped With -M-.effect: Enables Metal Blade mode which fires Buzzkill shots when uncharged. Modes can be switched by reloading Megahand with a full magazine.

Get Equipped With -Q-.effect: Enables Quick Boomerang mode which fires small boomerang shots that stun enemies when uncharged. Modes can be switched by reloading Megahand with a full magazine.

Get Equipped With -W-.effect: Enables Leaf Shield mode, where uncharged shots fire leaves while charged shots fire regular charged Megahand shots. Killing enemies in this mode spawns leaves that orbit the player, blocking enemy shots. Modes can be switched by reloading Megahand with a full magazine.

Ghost With The Most.effect: Ghosts from Gunslinger's Ashes are larger and can freeze enemies. Reload time decreased by 20%.

Gilded Tables.effect: Tables have a 15% chance to be golden. Flipping a golden table will cause all normal enemies in the room to drop 2 to 6 extra  upon death. Golden tables will not automatically flip due to Table Tech Money.

Great Queen Ant.effect: Gungeon Ant becomes an ant queen and shoots rocket ants.

Greener Guon Stone.effect: Chance for the Green Guon Stone to heal upon taking damage is raised to 70% if that damage would have killed the player. 20  also appears whenever Green Guon Stone heals the player.

Gruber's Bane.effect: Backup Gun has a 100% chance of firing shadow bullets.

Gunderlord.effect: Patriot shots are connected with electricity. Ice Breaker fires single high-velocity shots instead of shotgun spreads, and Ice Breaker ammo slowly regenerates over time.

Gungeonite.effect: Gamma Ray leaves poison on the ground.

Gunnerang.effect: Increases the damage of thrown guns by 50%.

Guns and Deviltry.effect: Increases the guns' damage by 25%, and they fire a knife whenever reloading.

Hacker.effect: Increases the damage of Lower Case r by 25%.

Hail To The King.effect: Increases Yari Launcher's magazine size by 50% and damage by 20%.

Hammer and Anvil.effect: Firing Cobalt Hammer's charge attack also sends out anvils in all directions.

Hammer and Nail.effect: Increases max ammo of both guns by 50%. Nail Gun deals triple damage. H4mmer gets 5 hammer shots at the end of every magazine.

Hard Light.effect: Hyper Light Blaster gains homing and its maximum ammo is increased by 50%. Light Gun has a chance to regenerate ammo when hitting enemies.

Hardwood.effect: Mahoguny fires four explosive shots at a time.

Heart-Shaped Box.effect: Lament Configurum heals the player instead of dealing damage.

Heavy Jolt.effect: Jolter changes appearance, gains increased knockback and increased accuracy.

Heavy Metal.effect: Decreases Anvillain's shot speed by 25% and increases damage by 20%.

Hegemony Special Forces.effect: Hegemony Rifle bullets are replaced by piercing lasers.

Hell Singing.effect: Increases the damage of the guns against jammed enemies by 50%.This bonus stacks with the damage from Silver Bullets, for a total of 487.5% damage to jammed enemies.

Hellhole.effect: Singularity spawns a hell portal that sucks enemies in and deals high damage.

Hidden Tech Bees.effect: A swarm of bees replaces enemy bullets when a table is flipped.

Hidden Tech Big Shotgun.effect: Table Tech Shotgun shoots Big Shotgun rounds when Big Shotgun is held.

Hidden Tech Flare.effect: Flipping tables ignite enemies in higher damage green fire. Range is also greatly increased

Hidden Tech Time.effect: Flipping a table briefly stops time.

HIDDEN.effect: In addition to its standard bonuses, upon successfully activating an active reload, Cog of Battle multiplies Klobbe's damage and knockback by 10 and removes all spread for a random portion of the current magazine. This is a hidden synergy. It doesn't have a name and the blue arrow won't appear.

Holy Bell.effect: Killing an enemy with Trident creates a large circular area that slows time.

Hornucopia.effect: Banana splits into 5 new bananas instead of 3 upon impact, one of which will explode into 4 more bananas. Using Charm Horn fires a banana at each enemy it charms.

Hot Ones.effect: Significantly increases the chance of firing fire bullets.

Hot Rolls.effect: Rolling creates a trail of fire.

Hotter Than Heck.effect: Increases the size and damage of the guns by 25% and grants immunity to fire.

Human Shield.effect: Upon use, Melted Rock spawns a Betrayer's Shield shield on every corpse.

Hunter-Seeker Tables.effect: Table rockets home in on enemies while Com4nd0 is held.

Hydro Pump.effect: Increases the size, knockback, speed, and damage of Mega Douser's stream.

Hyper Beam.effect: When Pig dies, Heroine's ammo is fully refilled and it temporarily switches to Hyper Beam mode, where uncharged shots deal 80 damage and charged shots deal 160 damage. Heroine will automatically revert to its original form after 30 seconds.

I need scissors! 61!.effect: Trank Gun's fire rate is decreased, damage and reload time are increased, and its bullets will inflict slow and stun.

Ice Accumulation.effect: Significantly increases the size of the gun's shots, and increases the amount of damage they gain from Snowballets.

Ice Beam.effect: Enables Ice Beam mode, which fires a projectile that instantly freezes an enemy when fully charged. Modes can be switched by reloading Heroine with a full magazine.

Ice Cap.effect: Freeze Ray freezes enemies much quicker.

Ice To Meet You.effect: Firing with any gun will periodically fire a Heart of Ice projectile that splits and bounces.

Ice Water.effect: Mega Douser freezes enemies and leaves a trail of ice. Both weapons deal 30% more damage, and the size of the Mega Douser's stream is increased.

In The Mood!.effect: Slightly increases movement speed and increases the shot speed of the guns by 25%.

Inconsistent Scale.effect: While Gungeon Ant is held, creates a beehive orbital that spawns bees.

Insight.effect: A creature appears at entrances to secret rooms, revealing their location.

Iron Slug.effect: Big Iron fires a single high-damage slug.

Iron Stance.effect: Increases damage and knockback by 20%, increases shot speed by 50%, and decreases reload time by 20%.

Iroquois.effect: Decreases the reload time of MAC10 by 33%, increases its magazine size by 50%, and increases its knockback by 50%.

It's Your Destiny.effect: Ice Breaker fires single high-velocity shots instead of shotgun spreads, and slowly regenerates ammo over time. The Exotic's rockets split into 14 smaller rockets instead of 7.

Jolly Roger.effect: Skull Spitter fires three skulls per shot, and skulls are linked like VertebraeK-47 shots. VertebraeK-47 can freeze enemies.

Jotun Time.effect: Reloading chills and freezes nearby enemies. Thrown guns deal 180% more damage.

Jumping... is useless.effect: Quad Laser shots fire four continuous lasers in a cross formation as they travel. Doubles Quad Laser's shot speed and triples its reload time.

Junk Mail.effect: Mailbox only shoots packages while Magazine Rack is active.

Just In Case.effect: Lower Case r becomes a capital letter R and transforms into a one shot rocket launcher. It fires the word ROCKET with cloud sprites when shot, and creates a cartoony BOOM cloud when it hits something.

Just Like The Real Thing.effect: Shotgrub fires a wide spread of five bullets, which bounce back and split into waving bullets after hitting a wall, similar to the Shotgrub enemy's attack.

Just Shoot Me.effect: Magazine Rack shoots at nearby enemies while it is active and Camera is held.

Kage Bunshin.effect: Using Decoy spawns a shadow clone of the player that mirrors their movements and fires towards the crosshair whenever the player fires.

Kaliber k'pow uboom k'bhang.effect: The split soul initially moves towards the player instead of away.

Kaliber's Grip.effect: Abyssal Tentacle grabs two enemies at a time.

Kalibreath.effect: Dragunfire turns grey and has an increased rate of fire.

Keep The Change.effect: Blank Companion's Ring will sometimes activate when M16 empties its magazine.

Keeping The Beat.effect: Metronome grants +4% damage per kill instead of +2%, and maxes out at +250% damage instead of +150%. Metronome's icon color goes from red to purple to grey instead of ending at red.

Key Witness.effect: Occasionally fires an AKEY-47 shot whenever the player fires a gun.

King Bomber.effect: Lil' Bomber's bombs become gold and spawn  every time they hit an enemy.

Knight Time.effect: Taking damage will briefly stop time.

Kung Fu Hippie, Rappin' Surfer.effect: Increases Rad Gun's magazine size to 20, and decreases its reload speed, giving more time to hit the mark. Also grants 1.33 coolness, makes the skateboard pink, and turns the hat backwards.

Land Among The Stars.effect: Killing enemies with Moonscraper has a chance to send out three planets, which damage enemies and start orbiting the player if they fail to hit an enemy.

Laser Light Show.effect: Laser Rifle becomes blue and gold, and fires 3 sets of 3 shots in a spread per trigger pull. Each shot bounces once.

Liches Get Stitches.effect: Grants a large attack speed increase for a short duration after an enemy is killed.

Like Shooting Fish.effect: A fish pops out of the barrel and fires bullets. The last shot of each magazine fires a fish that flops around on the ground and fires at enemies.

Lotus Bloom.effect: Laser Lotus gains the appearance of a flower. Its magazine size increases to 32, its maximum ammo increases to 250, its fire rate greatly increases, and it deals half damage.

Lumberjacked.effect: Increases the damage of the guns by 25%.

M1 Multi-Tool.effect: Decreases M1's reload time by 20% and increases its magazine size, and maximum ammo. Increases movement speed. Changes appearance to resemble an M14.

Mad Cats.effect: The bullets shot from Cat Bullet King Throne home in on enemies.

Mak Pak.effect: Increases Makarov's maximum ammo by 30%. While holding Makarov, it occasionally fires a homing bullet at an enemy for free.

Mass Cutter.effect: Whenever a Mass Shotgun shot splits, a cone of Mine Cutter lasers is fired.

Massive Effect.effect: Significantly increases the size of Mass Shotgun's shots.

Master's Chambers.effect: Each Master Round the player carries permanently unlocks the mode of its respective floor for Chamber Gun. Reloading the gun with a full magazine cycles through the unlocked modes.

Max Pane.effect: If hit, Glass Guon Stone breaks, but Glass Cannon retains its ammo.

Maximize Spell.effect: Flame Hand becomes green and creates pools of green fire. Green fire does not damage the player, and enemies that touch green fire are permanently aflame.

Meltdown.effect: Gamma Ray branches twice to form a spread of 5 beams. Using Big Boy refills 100 Gamma Ray ammo.

Mine Craft.effect: Mines created by Cluster Mine home in on enemies.

Mirror Shield.effect: Shield of the Maiden reflects enemy bullets while active.

MM6 Mini Rocket.effect: Activating Jetpack fires a rocket in the direction of the crosshair. This has an approximate 5 second cooldown.

Mmmmmmmmm MMMMmm!.effect: Increases the damage, maximum ammo, and rate of fire of the guns by 25%.

Monster Grub.effect: Shotgrub reloads faster and its bullets gain homing.

Monsters and Monocles.effect: Increases the ignition range of Teapot's reload effect.

Moonplanet.effect: A moon orbits the player that blocks enemy shots.

Mr. Shadow.effect: Zorgun Shadow Bullets become the random explosives Zorgun fires as its last shot.

Napalm B.effect: Mega Douser's water spreads fire instead of extinguishing it.

Natural Selection.effect: Evolver evolves after every 3 unique enemy types killed instead of 5.

Needless Acrimony.effect: Rage duration is greatly increased if a table is flipped while Shotgun Full of Hate is held.

Neo Tech, Yo.effect: Mutation's beam turns blue and creates electrified water. The player is immune to electricity while Mutation is held.

No Odd Job.effect: The guns are dual-wielded. Increases damage by 20% and spread by 60%, decreasing accuracy.

Not Quite As Mini.effect: Increases Vulcan Cannon's maximum ammo by 25% and significantly increases fire rate.

Not So Sawed-Off.effect: Buzzkill's saw blades are linked by lightning.

Noxin Cannon.effect: Luxin Cannon and its shots turn grey, and the lasers deal 25% more damage.

One Fish Two Fish.effect: With each shot, Barrel fires a normal blue fish and a red fish that sets enemies on fire.

Oranger Guon Stone.effect: Orange Guon Stone grows in size, fires more frequently, and deals more damage.

Orrery.effect: Planets fired by Mr. Accretion Jr. have smaller bullets orbiting them like moons; these bullets persist when the missed shots start orbiting the player.

Outer Limits.effect: Firing three planets into Singularity's black hole causes it to explode and deal 100 damage to all enemies in the room.

Over Dose.effect: Heavy Bullets no longer decreases shot speed.

Pandemic Pistol.effect: Plague Pistol bullets bounce and are connected with electricity.

Paper Lanterns.effect: While holding either gun in a room with enemies, paper lanterns periodically spawn, which drift towards enemies and deal damage.

Paperwork.effect: The first shot after reloading Origuni fires three planes.

Parchmental.effect: Each Origuni shot fires two maps.

Particle Accelerator.effect: Whenever a smaller bullet hits an enemy, a laser is automatically fired in its direction.

Particle Flow.effect: The guns home in on enemies.

Pea Cannon.effect: Pea Shooter shots become larger, deal more damage, and explode.

Peripheral Vision.effect: Upon hitting an enemy 3 times with Light Gun, a dog appears and attacks that enemy.

Phoenix Up.effect: Changes the look of Phoenix and summons a Phoenix companion that fires at enemies.

Pilot Wingsman.effect: Wingman fires four rockets at a time.

Pinker Guon Stone.effect: Enemies that damage the player become temporarily charmed.

Pistol Machine.effect: Machine Pistol shots gain the effect of Angry Bullets and are connected with electricity.

Pitch Perfect.effect: Pitchfork fires green fireballs, setting enemies permanently aflame.

Plant Power.effect: Triple Gun reaches its laser beam phase earlier.

Plasma Beam.effect: Enables Plasma Beam mode, which fires a fire laser when uncharged and a large piercing fire projectile when charged. Modes can be switched by reloading Heroine with a full magazine.

Porkulent.effect: Allows the player to make purchases without losing the  Ring.

Poseigun.effect: Trident fires a spread of three beams per shot, no longer benefits from rolling, has its magazine size increased to 8, and has its fire rate reduced greatly. Crown of Guns randomly fires Trident beams.

Praise the Gun.effect: Dodge roll recovery time is reduced. A bonfire spawns in every Shop and elevator to the next floor. If the player dies, they will respawn at the last bonfire they activated instead of at the start of the floor.

Primitive Shapes.effect: Tangler's shots become much larger and deal 50% more damage, but travel very slowly. Quad Laser's shots become rectangles and travel faster.

Production Model.effect: Prototype Railgun shots bounce up to 5 times.

Pulp Gungeon.effect: A copy of M1911 orbits the player and fires whenever the player fires.

Queen of Hearts.effect: When at full health, picking up hearts will turn them to coins.

Quick and the Gundead.effect: Shots fired by Hip Holster home in on enemies.

Rabid.effect: Lower Case r spells out LOSER, DORK, CHUMP, NOODLE, and TAFFER.

Radiant.effect: Lower Case r spells out SILVER, BLESSED, and WEREWOLF.

RAIDEN.effect: Increases Raiden Coil's max ammo capacity by 25%. Pairs of bullets are fired alongside the laser. Massively reduces ammo consumption.

Raizo's Stuff.effect: Bullets shot while being pulled with Grappling Hook gain homing.

Ravishing.effect: Lower Case r spells out HANDSOME, CHARM, and CUTE.

Reactive.effect: Lower Case r spells ROCKET, BOOM, KABOOM, and POW when fired and rounds explode.

Reanimate.effect: Lower Case r spells out SPOOKY, GHOST, and BOO.

Recycling Bin.effect: Trashcannon becomes a recycling bin with higher damage and a larger magazine size, and no longer creates poison projectiles.

Redder Guon Stone.effect: Red Guon Stone's size is increased. Player will gain a yellow glow and stat increase similar to that of Macho Brace for a short time whenever Red Guon Stone blocks a bullet.

Regular Old Guns.effect: Quadruples the guns' rate of fire but decreases their damage by 25%.

Reinforced.effect: Lower Case r spells out BULLET+1.

Reload Roll.effect: Rolling reloads six bullets. Dodge roll distance is increased by 20% when the gun held.

Relodestar.effect: After Relodestone's effect ends, the bullets that were absorbed are shot out of the player dealing damage to enemies.

Remnant.effect: When firing Lower Case r, adds an omega letter after each BULLET.

Replete.effect: Lower Case r spells out COWABUNGA, BOOYAKASHA, THANK YOU, THANKS, HASTA LA VISTA, TOODLES, GOODBYE, FAREWELL and GAME OVER.

Research.effect: Lower Case r spells out CHEST and MIMIC. Can be used to open locked chests.

Resourceful Indeed.effect: Player becomes the Resourceful Rat. This prevents items from being stolen when they're left behind in rooms.

Resplendent.effect: Lower Case r spells out CASH, COINS, SHELLS, and GOLD.

Revolution.effect: Increases the damage of Dueling Pistol by 25%, and allows its bullets to bounce five times instead of twice.

Root.effect: When firing Lower Case r, adds an alpha letter before each BULLET.

Rubenstein's Monster.effect: The two guns are combined to form Rubenstein's Monster.

Ruby Carbine.effect: Hegemony Carbine shots light enemies on fire and bounce.

Ruby Weapon.effect: The last shot of each magazine is guaranteed to be a fire bullet.

Runic.effect: Lower Case r spells out ABRA and KADABRA.

Running Blades.effect: Killing an enemy with Deck4rd has a high chance to spawn a Knife Shield knife.

Sausage and Peppers.effect: Significantly increases the radius of Gungeon Pepper's damaging aura, and Meatbun heals five hearts.

Saved the Best for Last.effect: Shots fired by Hip Holster explode.

Savior of the Universe.effect: Flash Ray's shots gain unlimited piercing, a thicker beam, one bounce, and increased fire rate. When reloaded from an empty clip, Flash Ray produces a flash that hits all enemies in the room, like Camera. Camera fires 2 laser beams when fired.

Second Accident.effect: Shotbow fires 9 parallel arrows straight forward.

Secret Twin.effect: Holding Vulcan Cannon and using Ticket spawns two friendly Gatling Gulls instead of one.

Serious Sam Publishing Contract.effect: Alongside the standard cannonball, Serious Cannon fires a screaming man who chases enemies and explodes on contact. Serious Cannon also gains a chance to "Devolve" enemies.

Shadow Warrior.effect: A Demon Head orbits the player while they have one of the guns held. When they reload one of them, the orbiting Demon Head fires at nearby enemies. Reduces the guns' spread by 60%, increasing their accuracy.

Shell-A-Ton.effect: Baby Good Shelleton moves and shoots much faster.

Shield Night.effect: Reloading Knight's Gun places a shield, similar to Betrayer's Shield.

Shotgun Affinity.effect: All weapons in the SHOTGUN gun class gain piercing, increased knockback, and increased shot speed. Shotgun style weapons that aren't in the SHOTGUN class, such as the Shotgun Full of Love or Tangler are not affected.

Shredder.effect: Doubles the spread of the guns, decreasing their accuracy.

Siren Sidearm.effect: The first shot of every Siren magazine fires two fish. Every Barrel shot fires a Siren water bubble.

Sleuth Out.effect: While held, decreases enemy projectile speed by 20%, but decreases 38 Special's rate of fire by 20%.

Slings and Arrows.effect: Bow can be charged longer to fire a special arrow that deals 50 damage.

Smile, you son of a....effect: Compressed Air Tank's sharks will explode upon biting an enemy. These explosions can damage the player.

Snicker-snack.effect: Excaliber fires a spread of 3 homing shots that deal 20% less damage.

Sniper Woof.effect: Reduces reload times of the guns by 30%. Standing still for a short time (around 12 seconds) causes the player to glow yellow, increasing the damage of the guns by 50%. This effect persists until the player switches weapons or moves. Sniper Shells and Professionals are permanently charmed.

Snowball Shotgun.effect: Snowballer fires multiple snowballs at once in a shotgun spread with lowered rate of fire.

Soft Air.effect: When holding JK-47, the player regains ammo when walking over liquids. Increases range that reloading causes fear.

Softshell.effect: While Stuffed Star is active, Brick Breaker shells are continually fired in random directions.

Solar Flare.effect: Flare Gun pierces enemies and explodes when hitting a wall.

some even larger number.effect: Killing an enemy with Triple Gun shoots a Quad Laser bullet from where the enemy died.

Space Best Friend.effect: Space Friend fires at a much faster rate.

Spartan Loadout.effect: Cat Claw pierces enemies, attaching its explosive to every enemy hit. Alien Sidearm can be charged twice to fire a more powerful shot.

Special Delivery.effect: Makes the guns' shots bounce. Owl becomes skeletal in appearance and fires bouncing, letter-shaped bullets.

Special Reserve.effect: Molotovs create green fire pools. Green fire does not damage the player, and enemies that touch green fire are permanently aflame.

Spelunker.effect: Replaces the bullet spread of Gunboots with a short-ranged explosion.

Spengbab.effect: Increases the knockback and range of Tangler by 50%.

Spicy D-Boys.effect: Increases coolness by 2. Lights nearby enemies on fire while reloading Strafe Gun.

Square Brace.effect: Increases Polaris ammo capacity to 700, increases its magazine size to 30, increases damage by 20%, increases fire rate when leveled up, and changes its appearance.

Star Friends.effect: While Stuffed Star is active, the player continually fires maximum level Polaris shots in all directions.

Starburst Fire.effect: Firing once with either weapon rapidly fires its entire magazine. Increases damage by 20% and doubles fire rate.

Steel Skin.effect: AC-15 will remain in its powered-up form even if the player has no armor.

Succulent DOOM.effect: Every Cactus shot fires a spread of 5 needles.

Super Bomberpal.effect: Lil' Bomber fires two bombs instead of one, charges twice as fast, and has 20% lower reload time.

Super Serum.effect: Increases the magazine size of the guns by 50%, increases the size of their projectiles, and allows them to bounce once.

Super Space Turtle DX.effect: Super Space Turtle becomes jammed, firing piercing shots with higher damage.

Sweetness and Light.effect: Magic Lamp gains triple shot. Each shot deals 25% of the normal damage, but the genie deals full damage.

Swift Sloop.effect: Increases Corsair's shot speed by 50%, decreases its charge time by 33%, and decreases its reload time by 20%.

Synthetic Shield.effect: Creates a companion that orbits the player and blocks shots. If the player has two of the three synthesizers, the companion will take the appearance of the third synthesizer. If the player has all three synthesizers, all three companions will spawn.

Tea for Two.effect: When reloading Teapot, a red aura appears around companions. Every enemy in this aura will be ignited.

Tears of Blood.effect: Tear Jerker's tears turn red and inflict slow.

Telefrag.effect: If Teleporter Prototype teleports the player to a room with enemies, all enemies in the room will be killed instantly. If it teleports the player to a special room, Teleporter Prototype's cooldown is decreased.

Terminated, Too.effect: Grenade Launcher's grenades fire 8 bullets in all directions upon exploding.

that &^#$# 'pizza'.effect: RPG now fires remote-controlled explosive fists, just like Machine Fist. Machine Fist's bullets also bounce twice.

The Ecstasy Of Gold.effect: Increases the damage of both guns by 25%.

The Elephant in the Room.effect: Elephant Gun becomes an elephant head and shoots elephants instead of bullets.

The Line Of Fire.effect: Composite Gun shots leave a trail of fire.

The Red Hood.effect: While Huntsman is held, Wolf's attacks will significantly weaken enemies.

The Return.effect: Pig fires bats and gains a green appearance.

The Void Corps.effect: When one of the guns is held, the other(s) orbit the player. Whenever the player reloads, the orbiting gun(s) fire towards the crosshair.

There Is Only War.effect: Reloading Jolter causes Demon Head to fire a beam at nearby enemies.

Thermal Imaging.effect: The Predator fires two lasers instead of one.

Thorn Bath, ooh!.effect: While one of the guns is held, nails are periodically fired in all directions.

Three Part Harmony.effect: Really Special Lute's spread is drastically decreased.

Three Sheets.effect: Increases movement speed, doubles the damage of the guns, and increases their bullet speed by 20%.

Throw All Daggers.effect: Knife Shield generates two layers of knives upon use.

Thrown For A Bloop.effect: While Bullet Time is active, a Blooper orbits the player and continually fires at enemies.

Tile Match.effect: When the player fires Tetrominator, each Guon Stone has a chance to shoot a Tetromino corresponding to the type of Guon Stone.

To Serve Android.effect: Police Officer turns into a robot and becomes unkillable.

Trigger Twins.effect: The guns are dual-wielded. All guns have double ammo capacity and 50% larger magazine size.

Triple Sticky.effect: Sticky Crossbow fires three bolts per shot and its magazine size increases from 5 to 6. Triple Crossbow's triple shot explodes upon hitting an enemy.

Turret Link.effect: Portable Turret will sometimes fire shots from guns in the player's inventory.

Turtle Solutions.effect: Each room clear spawns another Super Space Turtle, up to a maximum of 4.

Tutorialized.effect: A shield orbits the player, blocking enemy bullets.

Twin Snakes.effect: Rattler fires a spread of poison beams instead of bullets and Snakemaker fires homing shots.

Two Eggs Over Easy.effect: The Scrambler's homing shots will cause poison.

Two Heavy.effect: Doubles the chance for Coin Crown to spawn money upon completing a room.

Two Kinds of People.effect: Improves the items and pickups dug up by Knight's Gun.

Unbelievably Charming.effect: While holding either the Charmed Bow or Shotgun Full of Love, all shots fired by the player (even shots fired via items other than either gun) and any companions are guaranteed to charm enemies. In addition, the player is followed by a fairy that blocks bullets and displays the contents of chests.

Usurper.effect: Crown of Guns fires more bullets, and Cat Bullet King Throne fires full-sized bullets instead of mini-bullets.

Vegetables.effect: Shots from the guns deal triple damage, are doubled in size, pierce enemies, and bounce off of obstacles.

Wave Beam.effect: Enables Wave Beam mode, which fires two wavy projectiles connected by electricity when uncharged, and a standard large Heroine shot when charged. Modes can be switched by reloading Heroine with a full magazine.

Weird Science.effect: Three Science Cannon beams branch off perpendicular to Disintegrator's main beam.

Well Dressed.effect: Both guns fire explosive wardrobes at the end of their magazines.

Whale of a Time.effect: Also has a chance to spawn a healing skull if a weapon other than GuNNER is equipped when the player takes damage.

What A Thrill.effect: Patriot has a chance to transmogrify enemies into snakes.

what engine do you use.effect: Gungine fires a spread of three bullets per shot, but fires at 1/5th of its original speed.

Whiter Guon Stone.effect: Increases the size of White Guon Stone. If the player has Daruma, its cooldown is halved.

Why's Bullet Crying?.effect: Attacking a frozen enemy with one of the guns causes a yeti to attack it, dealing high damage.

Wicked Sister.effect: Magnum gains a bayonet that blocks bullets when reloading, similar to Huntsman.

Willing To Sacrifice.effect: Freeze Ray gains piercing and slowly regenerates ammo over time.

Worlds of Guncraft.effect: Gunderfury will occasionally fire Mr. Accretion Jr. shots.

Wound Up.effect: The damage and piercing of Wind Up Gun never decreases. Increases damage and bullet size by 25%.

Wrath Of The Blam.effect: Tear Jerker is replaced with a crying bullet head that can only fire in cardinal directions, but deals double damage.

y cant u crawl.effect: While Heroine is equipped, increases the size of Roll Bomb's explosions.

\\o/.effect: When Sunlight Javelin kills an enemy, it will spawn a circular zone that ignites all enemies within it.
